content: daisy coaster size e/4-3 50mm hook yarn used aunt lydia s crochet thread fashion 3 mercerized #1 colors maize white and sage guage 12 stitches by 18 row in 4 x4 in single_crochet guage is not critical it can be used motif to create a tablecloth which was my original intention design inspired/adapted from https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/icy-snowflake-af daisy coaster maize yellow chain 6 join with slip st to form a ring row 1 chain-3 counts as double_crochet 23 double_crochet join with slip st to chain-3 space 24 double_crochet spaces white row 2 slip st to join color beginning small shell chain-3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in same space skip next 2 double_crochet small shell 2 double_crochet chain-2 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from around 7 times join to beginning chain-3 8 small shells row 3 slip st in next double_crochet and chain-2 space center of small shell beginning medium shell ch3 counts as double_crochet 2 double_crochet chain-2 3 double_crochet in same space chain-1 * medium shell 3dc chain-2 3 double_crochet in center of next shell chain-1 repeat from * around 7 times join to beginning chain-3 8 medium shells row 4 slip st in next 2 double_crochet and chain-2 space center of small shell beginning large shell ch3 counts as double_crochet 3 double_crochet chain-2 4 double_crochet in same space chain-2 * large shell 4dc chain-2 4 double_crochet in center of next shell chain-2 repeat from * around 7 times join to beginning chain-3 finish off 8 large shells sage green row 5 slip st to join into center of large shell you will be creating a v into the chain spaces of row 2 -4 chain-1 * 3 single_crochet in center of shell single_crochet in next 4 double_crochet create the v single_crochet in chain-2 space between shells of row 4 chain-2 single_crochet in chain-1 space between shells of row 3 chain-2 single_crochet in space between shells of row 2 single_crochet in chain-1 space between shells of row 3 chain-2 single_crochet in chain-2 space between shells of row 4 single_crochet in next 4 double_crochet repeat around from join to 1st single_crochet row 6 slip st in next single_crochet chain-1 and single_crochet in same space should be the middle single_crochet in center of shell chain-3 skip next single_crochet 4 double_crochet in chain-2 space of row 4 between the v created chain-3 skip the nest 5 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet should be middle single_crochet in center of shell repeat from * around join to chain-3 space row 7 chain-5 counts as double_crochet and chain-2 space and double_crochet in same space 4 double_crochet in chain-3 space double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet 4 double_crochet in chain-3 space double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet in single_crochet space repeat around join in chain 5 space 112 double_crochet and 8 chain-2 spaces optional variation maize yellow row 8 join color with slip st in chain-2 space chain-5 counts as double_crochet and chain-2 space and double_crochet in same space as joining double_crochet in next 14 double_crochet
